name: SupMarine
description:
Part of the Global Game Jam 2020!

Explore the ocean and upgrade your supmarine.

Some upgrades can only be bought after unlocking others.

- W to go forwards

- ASD to move in other directions [Only after upgrades]

- Left Shift and Space to go up- and downwards [Only after upgrade]

- Mouse to rotate

- Left + Right arrow to go to next screen (Upgrade menus)
